src.CRUD package

src.CRUD.insert module

Date: 2021-12-13 Purpose: Store weight-training data https://tinydb.readthedocs.io/en/latest/getting-started.html

src.CRUD.insert.insert_all_logs(table, folderpath: str) → None[source]

Store all training logs in database.

Parameters:

  • table (TinyDB table) – A TinyDB table

  • folderpath (str) – A path to the workout log folder, from where each file will be inserted into the table

src.CRUD.insert.insert_log(table, log_path: Path | list) → None[source]

Store training log: log_path in database table.

Parameters:

  • table (TinyDB table) – A TinyDB table

  • log_path (str) – A path to the workout log file that will be inserted into the table

src.CRUD.insert.insert_specific_log(date: str, table, workout_number: int = 1) → None[source]

Store a specific training log in database.

Parameters:

  • date (str) – string of date in format YYYY-MM-DD

  • table (TinyDB table) – A TinyDB table

  • workout_number (int, optional) – unique identifier of the workout on a given day, in case of multiple workouts. Defaults to 1

src.CRUD.insert.main() → None[source]

Insert all simulated- or 1 or more real training logs
